glsa.title: cabextract: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in cabextract, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: cabextract is free software for extracting Microsoft cabinet files.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cabextract. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially-crafted archive in a .cab file, related to the libmspack library, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All cabextract users should upgrade to the latest version:
NOTE: This is a legacy GLSA. Updates for all affected architectures are available since August 03, 2010. It is likely that your system is already no longer affected by this issue.
